programs.program_name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

eligibility_criteria.high_school_diploma: Completion of a recognized secondary education qualification with a minimum GPA of 3.5.
eligibility_criteria.mathematics_requirement: Successful completion of advanced mathematics courses (e.g., Calculus, Algebra II).
eligibility_criteria.english_proficiency: TOEFL score of 90 or IELTS score of 6.5 (for non-native English speakers).

eligibility_criteria.bachelor_degree: A bachelor's degree from an accredited institution with a minimum GPA of 3.0.
eligibility_criteria.work_experience: Minimum of 2 years of relevant professional work experience.
eligibility_criteria.gmat_gre: GMAT or GRE score (minimum score requirements vary, check department website).
eligibility_criteria.english_proficiency: TOEFL score of 100 or IELTS score of 7.0 (for non-native English speakers).
